Don't only look at the node, check the node editor as well.

You can do that!? I clearly haven't played around with the maneuver node system enough. I finally just executed my first successful gravity assist yesterday.

Right click on an open manouver node will close it and show you 3 buttons. A red cross up top, which deletes the node. And bellow, 2 buttons that shift the manouver node in time, by 1 orbit (right 1 orbit in future, left 1 orbit in past).

With mods, you can shift manouver nodes in time on an actual slider, up to 1 second at a step
